author: ameya
content: I'm currently a student and am not expecting to be officially accepted, but can I still take part in the fellowship in an "unofficial" manner (without the stipend) just to work on some challenging engineering and research problems? Would all of the resources (calls, mentors etc.) still be available to those who're keen to participate, but have not been selected?

author: ameya
content: would love to get some insights on this <@364458974906548225>

author: ogenev
content: All resources and calls are public, everyone can participate and is welcome to do so. Officially "accepted " means you are eligible for a stipend during the length of the cohort.

author: pipermerriam
content: I'm only serving as a mentor during this cohort. Will need one of the folks running the program to answer that question.
